sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' // aca va a llegar el input, y va a mostrar la información espefcífica de esa película export default () => { const singleMovie = useSelector(state => state.singleMovie) return (

    {singleMovie.Title}

    {singleMovie.Plot}
    {singleMovie.Directors}
    {singleMovie.Actors}
    {singleMovie.Year}
    {singleMovie.Genre}
) } Card Title Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.
